name: Hyperdimension Neptunia Re;Birth2: Sisters Generation / 超次次元ゲイム ネプテューヌRe;Birth2 / 超次次元遊戲 戰機少女 重生2
description: Gamindustri has been taken over by a new threat, and the CPUs are nowhere to be found! It’s now up to their younger sisters to step into the spotlight and save the day in this hilarious, deeply customizable JRPG!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7(64bit) Processor: Core2Duo 2.66 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 10.x or OpenGL 3.3 or better graphics card with 1 GB RAM and support for v4 shaders DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 7 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card Additional Notes: Caution: ATI Mobility Radeon HD 5xxx, 1GB VRAM 5000 series may not work properly with this game.
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7(64bit) or later Processor: 3GHz Intel i3 or equivalent Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 10.x or OpenGL 3.3 or better graphics card with 1 GB RAM and support for v4 shaders DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 7 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card Additional Notes: Caution: ATI Mobility Radeon HD 5xxx, 1GB VRAM 5000 series may not work properly with this game.
